data: {"generalSituation":"Under the persistent influence of the dry northeast monsoon, the weather will be generally fine over southern China in the next few days. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas. A broad band of clouds will cover the coastal areas of Guangdong gradually in the middle and latter parts of next week. It will be cloudier over the region. An intense northeast monsoon is expected to reach southern China next weekend, temperatures will fall appreciably over the region. Besides, the tropical cyclone over the seas east of the Philippines will move towards the vicinity of the central and southern parts of the Philippines in the next couple of days. It will then enter the southern part of the South China Sea and weaken gradually.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251205","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Slightly cooler with cloudy periods in the morning.
